channel.title: plot on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in plot on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: A post in R Markdown
item.description: Slum provides a simple Hugo theme intended primarily to be used in conjunction with the blogdown package. Posts take the form of R Markdown documents. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed code chunks like this: library(tidyverse) library(slumstyle) Code that produces console output renders like this: glimpse(mpg) ## Observations: 234 ## Variables: 11 ## $ manufacturer <chr> "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", "audi", ".
